tika-s0403t9:0_0: (This should be expanded as in the previous discourse,)
tika-s0403t9:2_0: Next there are bites, “Take a detailed exposition;
tika-s0403t9:2_2: Reflecting on the third way to understand, and the course of wisdom is correct.
tika-s0403t9:2_3: And when that fruit of the path is developed and cultivated it’s very fruitful and beneficial and splendid and bountiful, saying,
tika-s0403t9:2_5: That’s why they are unable to make profit, in addition, they can deficient in perfection and conviducive to perfection.’
tika-s0403t9:2_6: If they’ve determined, but they perceive that they haven’t attained what they haven’t achieved, and achieved what they haven’t achieved.
tika-s0403t9:2_7: The fourth part of the body is finished.
tika-s0403t9:3_0: The first section for recitation on the full ordination is finished.
tika-s0403t9:4_0: The canonical text of Kakudha is finished.
tika-s0403t9:5_0: The second group of head is finished.
tika-s0403t9:6_0: The third group of nine on “without taking”.
